name: basic-informational-site
description: A webserver which serves static files on routes `/`, `/contact-me`, `/about` and 404 page on other incorrect routes. This project demontrates my understanding of creating a basic webserver, and working with files in NodeJS. # Server setup   To get started make sure you have the latest version of NodeJS installed. Run the following command to start the server.   ```bash     $ node index.js   ``` # Libraries - fs - http
